author: nidiculageorge
body:
Hi Team,

As per the below link in MS document 

https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-sql/database/automated-backups-overview?tabs=single-database#configure-backup-storage-redundancy-by-using-the-azure-portal 

# Change the backup storage redundancy for Database01 to zone-redundant. 
Set-AzSqlDatabase -ResourceGroupName "ResourceGroup01" -DatabaseName "Database01" -ServerName "Server01" -BackupStorageRedundancy Zone

The backup storage redundancy can be changed by the above command

But when i try i am getting the below error in my Azure subscription. I am running the below command from Azure Cloudshell

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/43850474/102455563-d5562800-4065-11eb-9bb3-04e239b4dadf.png)

But the RG name and every details are correct. Can someone let me know if the issue is due to the changes in Powershell

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @nidiculageorge The repository is for PowerShell development only. Please use other channels to report the issue like Azure support, forums and so on.

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body: This issue has been marked as external and has not had any activity for **1 day**. It has been be closed for housekeeping purposes.

title: Unable to update the Azure SQL Backup storage redundancy
